name: Cactus Conveyor
description:
MAKE SURE TO TURN YOUR VOLUME DOWN, it may be loud for some with high speaker volume. 

Also, if you are using a smaller screen zoom out to 50% so you can actually see the game, otherwise it looks really weird and doesn't work as it should.

Controls because I didn't bother adding instructions within the game:

AD or arrow keys to move the conveyor belt back and forth, up arrow or w to increase belt power, down arrow or s to decrease belt power. The belt power meter is on the left along with the balloons popped count. You lose by missing a balloon or tipping over. That's it.

This game is about a cactus going on a conveyor belt to pop balloons, definitely makes sense. I probably put more effort into this game then I should have but whatever lol. Hope you enjoy.

Credits:

druidic on freesound for clang effect - https://freesound.org/people/druidic/

DigitalDominic on freesound for balloon pop effect - https://freesound.org/people/DigitalDominic/

YouTube library for all the music.

If you were wondering (you probably weren't), I had to build this game like 10 times to get it on the web. WebGL needs some work.
